values: Brothers — Feel, Think, Preach God (Part 1)Brothers — Feel, Think, Preach God (Part 1)

If a pastor doesn’t pursue his own joy in God, he compromises his ministry. To overflow with grace and love, the pastor’s heart must be centered on God himself.
